ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. boneless skinless white fish fillets - choose a firm white fish like cod, snapper or halibut
1 1/2 lb. boneless skinless white fish fillets - choose a firm white fish like cod, snapper or halibut
Vegetable oil with a high smoke point for frying (I prefer grapeseed)
1/4 tsp cayenne (if spice sensitive, use just a pinch)
